categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic battalions

nodes.text: Carnivore Battalion was a military infantry battalion within the 501st Legion of the Galactic Republic that fought Clone Wars, and was part of a group of three brigades. During the Battle of Devaron, the clone troopers of Carnivore Battalion manned the All Terrain Tactical Enforcer Walker 773 and boarded a Separatist Alliance Munificent-class star frigate under the command of bounty hunter Cad Bane.
